name: FaceFudge
description:
Ever wondered how you'd look as a Victorian gentleman? Or as a hardened criminal? Or a 50's geek?

Find out with FaceFudge! It's a fun app that transforms your face into a variety of different guises at the click of a button - from mugshots and yearbook photos to ye olde victorians.

Take pictures of you and your friends and post the hilarious results on Facebook or Twitter!


Features:

- Use pictures from your photo library or the built-in camera

- Post the results to your Facebook and Twitter pages

- Save or EMail the photo to your friends

- 6 free templates to choose from (dozens more available with the full pack)
